name: Phantom Phazer
description:
WASD to move, Spacebar to jump, Left Mouse Button to advance dialogue

This demo was made during IMM 460 (Games 2) at The College of New Jersey. Made in Unity.

Concept, Level Design, and Primary Coding by Anthony Mendez

2D Assets and Animations by Julie Antonello

Music and Sound Effects by Meaghanne McBride

Player Movement and  Supplementary Music by Jordan Bradley

Dialogue System, Story and Riddle System by Tiffany Carey

Supplementary Coding by Miles Cumiskey
